questions.text: Why did Woody say he was looking for Sam?
questions.explanation:
because he wasn't there.

	He wanted to show Sam the gift he got Kelly. However, when Sam asked him why he was looking for him he misunderstood and took the question a little too literally.

a promise ring.

	The promise ring was a promise that one day he'd give her an engagement ring. Woody was very old fashion, which actually was rather sweet.

questions.text: How long would Kelly be in Europe?
questions.explanation:
1 year.

	Kelly's father was sending her to Europe for the entire year. Woody was not happy she was going.

questions.text: Why did Woody think Mr. Gaines was sending Kelly to Europe?
questions.correct: to get her away from Woody
options: to get rid of her for a while
to give her a good education
questions.explanation:
to get her away from Woody.

	When asked why Woody thought that, Woody said that Mr. Gaines told him that was why. Kelly's father didn't like Woody because while Mr. Gaines was rich, Woody was quite poor. He didn't like the idea of his daughter dating someone in a different class than they were.

questions.text: Who was designated driver for the night?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	When everyone put their names in for Carla to pick the designated driver, Norm dropped his on the floor. When they found out he was cheating and did it again everyone wrote down Norm except for Norm, he wrote Frasier.

questions.text: What did Woody and Kelly fight about?
questions.correct: Kelly thought Woody put down her father.
options: Woody thought Kelly didn't love him.
Woody thought Kelly was being stuck up.
questions.explanation:
Kelly thought Woody put down her father.

	Woody said, "I'm not putting down Daddy." Kelly responded, "Don't call him Daddy, he's not your daddy he's my daddy." The whole argument started when Woody said he knew how Kelly's father "was".

Tiberius.

	Here's a little known fact (except amongst "Star Trek" fans): Captain Kirk's middle name was also Tiberius. They were using middle names because of the fight.

Susan.

	When Kelly said Woody's name like she was making fun of it, he said her name the same way. Their fight doesn't look like a typical fight that you would normally see between a couple.

questions.text: How many Barbie dolls did Kelly own?
questions.explanation:
over 1000.

	Kelly was so rich she had brushes made specially for her dolls' hair. They finally quit fighting and agreed never to fight again "even if we have genuine disagreements".

no.

	They had planned to elope but then Kelly's father came in and Woody had to hide. While hiding, he over heard Kelly's father talking to Kelly. He came out of the closet when Mr. Gaines left and said he couldn't elope with Kelly because Mr. Gaines was "Kelly's only daddy and I'm just some guy with a ladder."
